name: Hurricane
effect: Wind Based. Inflicts Wounds. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the Foe. If performed under Rain or Strong Winds Weather, Ignore this move's Reduced Accuracy and gain Never Fail. If performed under Sunny Weather, Accuracy becomes -3 instead. -2 Accuracy.
description: The user attacks by wrapping the opponent in a fierce wind that carries the target up into the sky.
